dcterms:description: A dataset of 1.3 million labelled images, spanning 1000 categories. We only use the subset of 600 thousand images which include localization information.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:description: A dataset of 30 thousand Flickr images which are captioned in both English and German. The English captions are directly annotated for images, while the German captions are only translations of the English captions.
dcterms:title: Multi-30K
